svg.text:
title: "Week in Eth News
October 11, 2020" date: "2020-10-11"
Eth News and Links
Eth1
* Getting rid of RLP in binary tries
* Latest eip1559 call . Notes from Tim Beiko .
* Incubed v3.1 . ultralight client now has sentry option and new ABI encoder
EIPs/Standards
* EIP3026 : BW6-761 curve operations
* ERC3023: Contract wallet detection
* ERC3030 : BLS Remote Signer HTTP API
Proof of Stake launch
* Proof of stake launch (“eth2”) spec v1.0.0 , release candidate
* phase 0 launch EIP merged
* Formal verification of the deposit contract in Dafny
* eth2 bounty program launched
* A balancing attack on Gasper , a variation on Ryuya’s flipflop attack last year
* The response: add “synchronization bottleneck” gadget to LMD Ghost
* Estimate sequencer unpredictability in secret leader election
* phase 1: 2D data availability using Kate commitments
* Opcode changes for swapping PoS in for PoW
Layer2
* Curve implemented on zkSync ’s Zinc VM, live on testnet
* StarkWare: zk-rollups more capital efficient than optimistic rollups due to
withdrawal period
* Hermez zk-rollup releases whitepaper
* TheGraph will use State Channels on mainnet
This newsletter is made possible thanks to Matcha by 0x !
Matcha aggregates liquidity across decentralized exchange networks to offer you the
best price on every token swap. Trade 30+ DeFi tokens on Matcha today!
Stuff for developers
* Solidity v0.7.3 - dynamic array bugfix
* WalletConnect v1.3 , better mobile to desktop
* Remix v0.10.5 , bring your own web3 provider (eg WalletConnect plugin), debugger
connected to archive node
* Smock - mock Solidity in JavaScript
* Typechain v2 , full stack traces, fixes decoding of enums in libs
* ENSjs supports majority of ENS operations
* Vyper v0.2.6 , includes two critical bugfixes
* Learn Vyper tutorial, part 2
* Using Nethereum and Unity
* Getting started with Infura using Nodejs over websocket or https
* A guide for noobs to Eth coding security
* A honeypot contract to understand frontrunning
* 0x economist Peter Zeitz discovers critical bug in Curve/Swerve using a flashloan
when the curve updates
* Digital signatures on Ethereum , a primer
* Santi Palladino: The state of contract upgrades
Ecosystem
* MetaMask announces more than 1 million monthly active users and is monetizing by
adding an aggregator of aggregators swap tab
* Matt Leising’s Out of the Ether book released
* Bloxroute benchmarks speedup in transaction propagation using their API
* If you approve token spends by dodgy anon projects , don’t be surprised when you
lose money, even if you get out before the rug pull
Application layer
* Endaoment : donor-advised funds on Ethereum; USDC held on-chain and sent to
charities as directed. Lower overhead means lower fees. Live on mainnet now.
* Streamr’s framework to build data unions to sell your date collectively is live on
mainnet
* Stablecoin trading still hot: Shell Protocol is live on mainnet
* Cofix AMM : higher liquidity close to market price when volatility is low, using the
Nest oracle
* Kyber’s moves to adapt to market conditions
Regulation/business/tokens
* the United States federal framework for criminal crypto enforcement
* John McAfee charged with fraud by the SEC
* Why ETH is headed for 5000 USD
* The multiple personal token future
General
* PLONK by hand explainer (link to part 1, here is link to part 2 )
* ElGamal encryption, decryption, and rerandomization, with circom support
* Reason Magazine has the first of a 4 part series on the cypherpunks
* Brave’s new onion service to make its sites available over TOR
* a16z crypto startup documentary
* Bruno Maçães: Ethereum as the basis for the evolution of the city state
Job Listings
* DeFi devs! Yield is hiring for Solidity and front-end – contact@yield.is
* Live for DeFi? mStable is looking for a Smart Contract/Protocol Developer
* Nori is hiring senior engineers and UX for their CO2 removal marketplace
* Variant Fund is hiring a data-driven analyst to join the investment team
* Dev-centric Head of Product Marketing sought for Chainlink!
* Trail of Bits hiring elite blockchain security engineers & app security
* 0x is hiring devs! Full-stack, back-end, front-end or Solidity
* Celer Network: hiring Solidity and Go devs. Email: hiring@celer.network
Want your job listing here ? $250 per line (~75 character limit including spaces),
payable in ETH (or 250 DAI or 250 USDC) to evan.ethereum.eth. Questions?
thecryptonewspodcast at-gmail
🥩 Staking pool questionnaire: October 15 🥩
My questionnaire for staking pools is due October 15th.
If you’re wondering “ why didn’t my post make it into Week in Ethereum News ,” then
please put it on an Ethereum subreddit; emails/DMs are not part of my workflow.
Please click the following if you’re interested in sponsoring the newsletter .
Follow the newsletter on twitter: @WeekinEthNews
Permalink for this week’s issue:
https://weekinethereumnews.com/week-in-eth-news-october-11-2020/
Dates of Note
Upcoming dates of note ( new/changes in bold ) :
* Oct 12 - Zinken testnet (eth2 launch dress rehearsal ). Launch viewing party
* Oct 19-26 - EthLagos energy hackathon
* Oct 20 - submission deadline for Medalla data challenge
* Oct 29 - ETHBKK
* Oct 31 - submission deadline for Underhanded Solidity Contest
* Nov 6-7 - virtual Trufflecon
* Nov 16 - MetaMask Provider breaking changes
* Dec 3 - Ethereum in the Enterprise - Asia Pacific
Did you get forwarded this newsletter? Sign up to receive it weekly
Week in Ethereum News
